title: Komodo Dragons: Giant Reptiles
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,464 words, Level X (Grade 5), Lexile 1060L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     I and Q
description: Komodo dragons may be the biggest lizards in the world, but these animals are special in many other ways. Komodo Dragons: Giant Reptiles will open students' eyes to the world of these incredible creatures. Maps and photographs support the text.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
